lead_paragraph: The Yankees are not expecting a return to the halcyon days of 2005, but a quality start — three runs, six innings — from either Freddy Garcia and Bartolo Colon would be welcomed.
snippet: The Yankees are not expecting a return to the halcyon days of 2005, but a quality start — three runs, six innings — from either Freddy Garcia and Bartolo Colon would be welcomed.
